title: The Rake strikes back
text:
Dark Rona is back. Despite the victories and hopes brought by former Rebel Alliance batches, the dreadful lord and his new apprentice, Dark Delta still threaten peace in the galaxy.

The Rebel forces finest, Captain Bundler and Admiral Yarn are now in search of a new hope to give the final blow to the Dark Horse empire.

Luckily for them, a new generation of young apprentices have been secretly, sometimes remotely, training in the holy scripts of the Rails.

In their attempt to consolidate freedom and build new futures for the world and themselves, they have been creating 10 sacred digital weapons and prepare themselves for the last battle...

The big day is about to start, the Ruby galaxy is about to change, forever.
